items.title: 谷歌Gemini人工智能将登陆电视端
items.raw_excerpt: 谷歌的人工智能助手 Gemini 即将登陆电视端。本周一，谷歌宣布将为 Google TV推出 Gemini 功能，电视用户可通过该功能与人工智能进行流畅自然的语言对话。（新浪财经）

title_i18n.zh: 谷歌Gemini人工智能将登陆电视端
title_i18n.en: Google's Gemini AI is coming to television.
title_i18n.es: El inteligente artificial Google Gemini llegará a los televisores.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 谷歌的人工智能助手 Gemini 即将登陆电视端。本周一，谷歌宣布将为 Google TV推出 Gemini 功能，电视用户可通过该功能与人工智能进行流畅自然的语言对话。（新浪财经）
excerpt_i18n.en: Google's AI assistant Gemini is coming to television. On Monday, Google announced it will introduce Gemini functionality to Google TV, allowing users to engage in smooth, natural language conversations with the AI.
excerpt_i18n.es: El asistente de inteligencia artificial de Google, Gemini, llegará próximamente a los televisores. Este lunes, Google anunció que introducirá la función Gemini en Google TV, permitiendo a los usuarios mantener conversaciones fluidas y naturales con la inteligencia artificial mediante comandos de voz. (Sina Finance)

items.title: Show HN: Perfect your presentation with a panel of AI reviewers
items.raw_excerpt: Hi HN! We (Thorntale) are a startup building presentation tools, we noticed that while people disliked the tedium of making slide decks, a lot of people actively dread presenting those decks, especially if it's a high-stakes call or if they're inexperienced. Speaking from experience, practice helps a lot, but it can feel embarrassing to give the same pitch to your friend or cofounder for the tenth time. We built this prototype https://review.thorntale.com/ as a way to practice; upload a PDF deck, give your presentation, and the selected AI "personas" will analyze the slides and transcript and provide feedback. At the moment, we've tuned "personas" to give you feedback from the perspective of an investor, a teacher, or a marketing/branding lead (as well as a few entertaining extras.) If you

title_i18n.en: Show HN: Perfect your presentation with a panel of AI reviewers
title_i18n.zh: 展示：借助AI评审团完善您的演示文稿
title_i18n.es: Mostra HN: Perfecciona tu presentación con un panel de revisores de IA

excerpt_i18n.en: Hi HN! We (Thorntale) are a startup building presentation tools, we noticed that while people disliked the tedium of making slide decks, a lot of people actively dread presenting those decks, especially if it's a high-stakes call or if they're inexperienced. Speaking from experience, practice helps a lot, but it can feel embarrassing to give the same pitch to your friend or cofounder for the tenth time. We built this prototype https://review.thorntale.com/ as a way to practice; upload a PDF deck, give your presentation, and the selected AI "personas" will analyze the slides and transcript and provide feedback. At the moment, we've tuned "personas" to give you feedback from the perspective of an investor, a teacher, or a marketing/branding lead (as well as a few entertaining extras.) If you
excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好！我们是初创公司Thorntale，专注于开发演示工具。我们发现，尽管人们厌倦制作幻灯片的繁琐过程，但更多人其实害怕亲自演示这些幻灯片——尤其是在重要场合。
excerpt_i18n.es: ¡Hola HN! Somos Thorntale, una startup que desarrolla herramientas para presentaciones. Observamos que, aunque a la gente le disgusta la tediosa tarea de crear diapositivas, muchos sienten auténtico pánico a la hora de exponer esas presentaciones, especialmente si se trata de una situación de alta presión.

items.title: Show HN: I built an AI news site

title_i18n.en: Show HN: I built an AI news site
title_i18n.zh: 我建了一个AI新闻网站
title_i18n.es: Mostrado en HN: Creé un sitio de noticias de IA

excerpt_i18n.es:
Traduce la siguiente descripción del sitio web de inglés a español (es-ES) en un estilo natural y fiel. Conserva hechos y números. No añadas comillas ni explicaciones; devuelve solo la traducción:

AI News 247 es tu fuente principal de noticias sobre inteligencia artificial. Nuestro equipo de expertos recopila y resume las últimas novedades en IA para mantenerte informado. Con más de 10.000 artículos publicados y una comunidad de 50.000 miembros, somos la plataforma de referencia para profesionales y entusiastas de la IA.

items.title: Facebook Dating tries using AI to end ‘swipe fatigue’
items.raw_excerpt: Facebook Dating is getting new AI features to help users avoid “swipe fatigue,” Meta announced today. The new features include a new “dating assistant” AI chatbot that helps you find potential matches as well as a new “Meet Cute” feature that automatically matches you with someone using a “personalized” algorithm. With the dating assistant, you […]

items.title: NVIDIA, OpenAI Announce ‘the Biggest AI Infrastructure Deployment in History’

To discuss what this means for the next generation of AI development and deployment, the two companies’ CEOs, and the president of OpenAI, spoke this morning with Read Article

items.title: A ‘global call for AI red lines’ sounds the alarm about the lack of international AI policy
items.raw_excerpt: On Monday, more than 200 former heads of state, diplomats, Nobel laureates, AI leaders, scientists, and others all agreed on one thing: There should be an international agreement on “red lines” that AI should never cross — for instance, not allowing AI to impersonate a human being or self-replicate.  They, along with more than 70 organizations […]

title_i18n.en: A ‘global call for AI red lines’ sounds the alarm about the lack of international AI policy
title_i18n.zh: 全球人工智能红线倡议对国际人工智能政策缺失敲响警钟
title_i18n.es: Una llamada global por líneas rojas en la inteligencia artificial alerta sobre la falta de políticas internacionales en IA.

excerpt_i18n.en: On Monday, more than 200 former heads of state, diplomats, Nobel laureates, AI leaders, scientists, and others all agreed on one thing: There should be an international agreement on “red lines” that AI should never cross — for instance, not allowing AI to impersonate a human being or self-replicate.  They, along with more than 70 organizations […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 周一，超过200位前国家元首、外交官、诺贝尔奖得主、人工智能领域领袖及科学家等人士达成共识：应制定国际协议，明确人工智能不可逾越的"红线"。
excerpt_i18n.es: El lunes, más de doscientos exjefes de estado, diplomáticos, premios Nobel, líderes en inteligencia artificial, científicos y otros estuvieron de acuerdo en una cosa: debería existir un acuerdo internacional sobre "líneas rojas" que la IA nunca debería cruzar.

items.title: Rapid ML experimentation for enterprises with Amazon SageMaker AI and Comet
items.raw_excerpt: In this post, we showed how to use SageMaker and Comet together to spin up fully managed ML environments with reproducibility and experiment tracking capabilities.

title_i18n.en: Rapid ML experimentation for enterprises with Amazon SageMaker AI and Comet
title_i18n.zh: 企业借助亚马逊SageMaker AI与Comet实现快速机器学习实验
title_i18n.es: Experimentación rápida en aprendizaje automático para empresas con Amazon SageMaker AI y Comet

excerpt_i18n.en: In this post, we showed how to use SageMaker and Comet together to spin up fully managed ML environments with reproducibility and experiment tracking capabilities.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 本文展示了如何结合使用SageMaker和Comet来搭建具备可复现性和实验追踪功能的完全托管式机器学习环境。
excerpt_i18n.es: En esta publicación, mostramos cómo usar SageMaker y Comet juntos para crear entornos de aprendizaje automático completamente gestionados con capacidades de reproducibilidad y seguimiento de experimentos.
